name: PermitAndDepositDai
description: Allows users to approve and deposit dai into a prize pool in a single transaction.

functionDecorators.name: depositTo
functionDecorators.description: Deposits into a Prize Pool from the sender. Tokens will be transferred from the sender then deposited into the Pool on the sender's behalf. This can be called after permitAndDepositTo is called, as this contract will have full approval for a user.

parameterDecorators.name: prizePool
parameterDecorators.description: The prize pool to deposit into.

parameterDecorators.name: to
parameterDecorators.description: The address that will receive the controlled tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: controlledToken
parameterDecorators.description: The type of token to be minted in exchange (i.e. tickets or sponsorship).

parameterDecorators.name: referrer
parameterDecorators.description: The address that referred the deposit.

functionDecorators.name: owner
functionDecorators.description: Returns the address of the current owner.

functionDecorators.name: permitAndDepositTo
functionDecorators.description: Permits this contract to spend on a users behalf, and deposits into the prize pool. The Dai permit params match the Dai#permit function, but it expects the `spender` to be the address of this contract.

parameterDecorators.name: nonce
parameterDecorators.description: The nonce of the tx. Should be retrieved from the Dai token.

parameterDecorators.name: expiry
parameterDecorators.description: The timestamp at which the sig expires.

parameterDecorators.name: allowed
parameterDecorators.description: If true, then the spender is approving holder the max allowance. False makes the allowance zero.

parameterDecorators.name: prizePool
parameterDecorators.description: The prize pool to deposit into.

parameterDecorators.name: to
parameterDecorators.description: The address that will receive the controlled tokens.

parameterDecorators.name: controlledToken
parameterDecorators.description: The type of token to be minted in exchange (i.e. tickets or sponsorship).

parameterDecorators.name: referrer
parameterDecorators.description: The address that referred the deposit.

functionDecorators.name: renounceOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions anymore. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby removing any functionality that is only available to the owner.

functionDecorators.name: transferOwnership
functionDecorators.description: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.
